mapper.select: /* AuthReaderMapper.selectAdminInfo */ SELECT a.ADMIN_SEQ, a.COMP_SEQ, a.ADMIN_ID, a.ADMIN_PW, a.ADMIN_STAT_CD, a.ADMIN_TYPE_CD, group_concat(DISTINCT ag.ADMIN_GRP_ID) AS admin_grp_ids FROM `system`.admin a LEFT OUTER JOIN `system`.admin_grp_map agm ON agm.ADMIN_SEQ = a.ADMIN_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN `system`.admin_grp ag ON ag.ADMIN_GRP_ID = agm.ADMIN_GRP_ID WHERE a.ADMIN_ID = #{id}

/* AuthReaderMapper.selectAdminMenuList */ SELECT am.admin_menu_seq, am.prnt_admin_menu_seq, am.menu_nm, am.menu_url, am.menu_path, am.menu_lv, am.disp_no, am.disp_yn, am.use_yn, am.reg_dt, am.mod_dt, am.reg_seq, am.mod_seq FROM `system`.admin a LEFT OUTER JOIN `system`.admin_grp_map agm ON agm.ADMIN_SEQ = a.ADMIN_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN `system`.admin_grp ag ON ag.ADMIN_GRP_ID = agm.ADMIN_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN `system`.admin_grp_menu_map agmm ON agmm.admin_grp_id = ag.admin_grp_id LEFT OUTER JOIN `system`.admin_menu am ON am.admin_menu_seq = agmm.admin_menu_seq WHERE a.admin_seq = #{adminSeq}
